text: Egha Moses ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gumazir vamɨra gari, gumazir igharazim arazir kuram gamizɨ, a kotiamɨn aven bizir kamɨn gun mɨgei, eghtɨ gumazir kotiam barazim, gumazir kamɨn akam baraghan markɨ. Eghtɨ gumazir arazir kuramɨn gara an gun mɨgeibar dɨbobonim, a gumazir pumuning o pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn ikɨtɨ, ia gumazir kam isɨ kot datɨghtɨ, gumazir kaba an gun kotiam mɨkɨmam.
